title: Beijing Zheng Long Zhai Vegetarian
description: 北京正隆斋食品有限公司, is a vegetarian food shop that sells a large selection of vegetarian frozen raw and food products without onion, garlic, or egg; also a small selection of vegan bread and cakes. Will make custom cakes. Oct 2015 reported it relocated here from 3 Shi Xi Cheng Qu Xin Wen Hua Jie. Now has a restaurant associated with it upstairs - go through the back and up the stairs. New location is between Pinganli subway station and Xisi subway station a bit closer to Pinganli station, on the east side of the road.
